title: Ep 318 | Phil Robertson Spells Out Why Killing the Enemy While Serving Our Country Is Biblical
description:
Phil, Jase, Al, and Zach explain what "thou shalt not kill" really means and why it's biblical for our military to wage righteous war against the enemy. Jase and Missy argue about the one person he loves to text. Phil discovers a new reason to hunt ducks. Jase is REALLY into the Olympics, and Phil is fascinated by figuring out why someone would watch. And Phil explains why doing the right thing will always win you God's favor.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
